name: eco-coach-visualizer
description: The Eco Coach Visualizer is a simple data visualisation tool using NodeJS, google charts and HTML JavaScript front-end for Mercedes Benz Eco Coach app data. It provides a simple interface to visualize driving data from the Mercedes Benz Me Eco Coach app. The goal of the tool is to display the existing data in a new way to provide more insight and to calculate derivative data no displayed in the app itself.
